sentences.english: Clipper-built deck chair, comfortable siesta can be in summer cannot little spouse.

sentences.english: Monday's nap time, he particularly exciting, is not willing to go to bed.

sentences.english: With these keeping her "dry, " she hasn't fussed once during nap time.
